title: Kim Jong Un Says North Korea To Increase Number Of Nuclear Weapons
content: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un said the country is now implementing a nuclear force construction policy to increase the number of nuclear weapons "exponentially," state media KCNA said on Tuesday.
summary: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un said the country is now implementing a nuclear force construction policy to increase the number of nuclear weapons "exponentially," state media KCNA said on Tuesday.

title: Australia To Legislate Minimum Age For Social Media Usage
content: Anthony Albanese, the Prime Minister of Australia, said that they will legislate a minimum age for social media to keep children safe.
summary: Anthony Albanese, the Prime Minister of Australia, said that they will legislate a minimum age for social media to keep children safe.

title: Factbox- Apple iPhone 16 Event: Key Announcements So Far
content: Apple on Monday unveiled an artificial intelligence focused-iPhone 16 lineup, a sleeker Apple Watch, AirPods 4, and said new AI features will be added to its devices next month.
summary: Apple on Monday unveiled an artificial intelligence focused-iPhone 16 lineup, a sleeker Apple Watch, AirPods 4, and said new AI features will be added to its devices next month.

title: Apple Unveils New iPhone Built For Artificial Intelligence
content: Apple on Monday announced a new iPhone built for generative artificial intelligence as it seeks to boost sales and show it is keeping up in the technology race.
summary: Apple on Monday announced a new iPhone built for generative artificial intelligence as it seeks to boost sales and show it is keeping up in the technology race.

title: Former Canada Fashion Mogul Sentenced To 11 Years In Sex Assault Cases
content: Former Canadian fashion mogul Peter Nygard was sentenced to 11 years in prison on Monday after being convicted of four counts of sexual assault in attacks on women in his Toronto office building that in some cases date back for decades.
summary: Former Canadian fashion mogul Peter Nygard was sentenced to 11 years in prison on Monday after being convicted of four counts of sexual assault in attacks on women in his Toronto office building that in some cases date back for decades.

title: "Can't Tell What A Relief": Kate Middleton Finishes Chemotherapy Course
content: Kate, Britain's Princess of Wales, said on Monday she had finished her course of preventative chemotherapy for cancer and would be carrying out a handful of public engagements later this year, but said her path to full recovery would be long.
summary: Kate, Britain's Princess of Wales, said on Monday she had finished her course of preventative chemotherapy for cancer and would be carrying out a handful of public engagements later this year, but said her path to full recovery would be long.

title: UAE Crown Prince's Rajghat Visit Carries Forward A Unique Tradition
content: The Crown Prince of Abu Dhabi today visited Rajghat in New Delhi to pay tribute to Mahatma Gandhi and planted a tree sapling, making him the third generation leader from the United Arab Emirates (UAE) to plant a sapling at Rajghat.
summary: The Crown Prince of Abu Dhabi today visited Rajghat in New Delhi to pay tribute to Mahatma Gandhi and planted a tree sapling, making him the third generation leader from the United Arab Emirates (UAE) to plant a sapling at Rajghat.

title: "Lost Generation": Gaza School Year Begins With All Classes Shut
content: The new school year in the Palestinian territories officially began on Monday, with all schools in Gaza shut after 11 months of war and no sign of a ceasefire.
summary: The new school year in the Palestinian territories officially began on Monday, with all schools in Gaza shut after 11 months of war and no sign of a ceasefire.

title: California State Senator Used Her Male Chief Of Staff As Sex Slave: Lawsuit
content: The lawsuit filed by Chad Condit, claims that he was subjected to unwanted sexual advances and harassment while working as the senator's chief of staff.
summary: The lawsuit filed by Chad Condit, claims that he was subjected to unwanted sexual advances and harassment while working as the senator's chief of staff.

title: Top Ex US Military Officials Back Harris, Call Trump "Danger To Democracy"
content: A group of 10 retired top US military officials endorsed US Vice President Kamala Harris in a letter made public on Monday, saying she is the only presidential candidate fit to serve as the nation's commander in chief.
summary: A group of 10 retired top US military officials endorsed US Vice President Kamala Harris in a letter made public on Monday, saying she is the only presidential candidate fit to serve as the nation's commander in chief.

title: Kremlin Denies Putin Interview Request From Freed Reporter Evan Gershkovich
content: The Kremlin said Monday that it would not grant an interview with President Vladimir Putin to Wall Street Journal reporter Evan Gershkovich, who was released by Russia this summer in a prisoner swap.
summary: The Kremlin said Monday that it would not grant an interview with President Vladimir Putin to Wall Street Journal reporter Evan Gershkovich, who was released by Russia this summer in a prisoner swap.

title: Polio Survivor Who Ran A Roadside Stall Is Malaysia's Newest Billionaire
content: The $531 million initial public offering (IPO) of 99 Speed Mart is Malaysia's biggest in seven years.
summary: The $531 million initial public offering (IPO) of 99 Speed Mart is Malaysia's biggest in seven years.

title: China's Powerful LARID Radar Detects Plasma Bubble Over Egyptian Pyramids
content: The LARID radar can detect plasma bubbles, an unusual weather phenomenon that disrupts satellite communications and GPS by interfering with the ionosphere's charged particles.
summary: The LARID radar can detect plasma bubbles, an unusual weather phenomenon that disrupts satellite communications and GPS by interfering with the ionosphere's charged particles.

title: iPhone 16, New AirPods, Apple Watch: Launches At Apple's Mega Event Today
content: Apple Inc.'s most important event of the year takes place Monday, when the company will roll out its latest iPhones and set the stage for a new artificial intelligence platform.

title: Antibody That Can Counter All Known Covid Variants Found
content: Researchers have discovered an antibody that could counter all known variants of the coronavirus that causes COVID-19 and also distantly related ones that infect other animals.
summary: Researchers have discovered an antibody that could counter all known variants of the coronavirus that causes COVID-19 and also distantly related ones that infect other animals.

title: Opinion: Trump Is On Top - Despite Everything
content: One, Americans favour dynamism over compassion. The fastest growing US states - Texas, Florida, Montana - are ruled by Republicans; the slowest and the stagnant by Democrats.
summary: One, Americans favour dynamism over compassion. The fastest growing US states - Texas, Florida, Montana - are ruled by Republicans; the slowest and the stagnant by Democrats.

title: Watch: Dramatic Eagle vs Crocodile Showdown At South Africa National Park
content: A thrilling encounter between an eagle and a crocodile where they are both fighting for the same prey at South Africa's Kruger National Park has left wildlife enthusiasts stunned.
summary: A thrilling encounter between an eagle and a crocodile where they are both fighting for the same prey at South Africa's Kruger National Park has left wildlife enthusiasts stunned.

title: French Retail Giant Carrefour To Return To India By June 2025
content: French retail giant Carrefour announced Monday that it will return to India by June 2025 in a franchise partnership with Dubai firm Apparel Group, a decade after leaving the country.
summary: French retail giant Carrefour announced Monday that it will return to India by June 2025 in a franchise partnership with Dubai firm Apparel Group, a decade after leaving the country.
